runs.comm: defends the first ball towards midwicket
spinning down the leg side, Smith plays that leg-side slog that fetches him a huge portion of runs
this time he doesn't go for power, just making sure he hits that full ball hard enough to clear mid-on for four
worked towards square leg, Smith thinks of a quick single, then realises the man at the other end is Gayle
defends this towards square leg
a low full toss to end the over, nearly a yorker, Smith jams his bat down in time
starts with a leg-side wide
swinging in, this was a full ball, but that comes in towards the pads, fine leg is in the circle, Gayle glances that down for four
this is a better line, outside off, Gayle isn't sure how to deal with it, shapes up to defend then offers a limp bat and is beaten
Gayle going back for a full ball on middle and leg, taps the ball towards mid-on for a leisurely single
Tanvir getting the ball to curl away, Smith is tempted towards playing that outside off, he ultimately lets it go
this time he chases after it outside off, clearly beaten this time as the ball swerves away from him
absolutely no footwork again from Smith, doesn't stop him from flashing at a wide delivery outside, can't get bat on ball again

massive wicket, Hafeez has a stellar record against left-handers, and he gets Gayle on the first ball he bowls to him, Gayle stretches forward to play the ball, he plays down the wrong line and misses the ball outside off, his back leg is out of the crease, the keeper takes the bails off and there will be no Gaylestorm today
a little uppishly towards midwicket first up
superbly struck sweep shot from Simmons, gets on one knee and powers that behind square

skips away from leg stump and pushes the ball towards sweeper co ver. Afridi and Gul give chase, both slides at the same time, sort of synchronished diving, no idea why Gul was sliding there, since Afridi was the guy who was definitely getting the ball
another lofted drive, this time over mid-off for four
pitched up, on middle, Simmons gets behind the line and defends
Simmons defends this one towards backward point
whips this from off stump towards backward square leg
beaten by the angle as the ball zips across outside off

there's another one, Smith has been chasing the ball outside off several times, risky gamble playing so far away from his body, this time he connects, but it is only an edge, and a simple catch for Kamran Akmal
Tanvir answering the critics here, a superb delivery that curves away outside off, Samuels can't get his bat near that one, that ends an excellent over
His first ball is defended towards point
skips away from the stumps and thumps that towards cover, a diving stop from Shehzad, Pakistan look pumped-up, several fielders come up to pat Shehzad on the back for that stop
gets on one knee and murders that over midwicket, swept powerfully by Simmons, doesn't need to worry about the fielders when he gets this much distance on it

Simmons goes way back leg stump and cuts the ball past point for four, Babar dropped it a touch short, and though it was down the leg side, Simmons had moved into such a wide position that he can cut that away
defended to the off side
looks to run it towards short fine, off the pads
not sure Samuels was exactly in control there, as he dabs the ball on the bounce towards second slip
Tanvir pitches it up, 130kph, defended towards cover for a single, not too many of those in the West Indies innings so far
back of a length ball just outside off, dropped to the off side for a quick single
pitched up, and that;s what Samuels can do, elegantly puts it away through cover, stand and deliver shot to a delivery well outside off, no footwork either, but Samuels still made it look stylishly
down the leg side, off the thigh pad towards fine leg
leading edge towards cover, simmons was looking to work that delivery off the pads towards midwicket, the ball doesn't go where he intends though
Samuels waits on the back foot to try glide the ball past short fine, can't beat the fielder
fired in towards off stump, 101kph, backs away and guides this towards backward point
another dot ball, defended towards the off side
a bottom edge as he looks to thrash the ball through the off side, thick bottom edge sends the ball rolling towards point
sends this one towards deep extra cover for a couple
Gul starts with a short of length ball that is chopped towards deep point
short of length ball on the pads, helped towards the off side for a single
can't quite middle it as Simmons looks to power the ball through the off, the ball rolls towards cover

short ball from Gul, Simmons was charging out and looking to swipe that through the leg side, he was backing away from the leg stump, Gul followed him, that was a quick delivery as well, Simmons is struck on the gloves as he goes for the stroke anyway, seems to have hurt himself, taking the gloves off immediately

oh, he's certainly okay, he steps down the track once more, swings away again at a shortish ball, makes solid contact this time, and the ball sails over long-on for six, Simmons isn't going to change tactics
eases this towards cover to end the over
steers this towards backward point, 'Umar,' shouts the keeper as U Akmal fields
pitched up, this is flicked away towards square leg
hello, hello, Simmons looking to ramp the ball over the keeper's head, doesn't get it off the middle of the bat, the edge though soars over short fine leg, Simmons survives
driven towards sweeper cover for a single
tapped towards point for a single, a direct hit from Umar Akmal at the non-striker's end, and there's an overthrow as well
slanting towards leg, length ball, is driven towards long-on
spinning in from back of a length, from well outside off, defended towards cover
ajmal getting the ball to turn here, but this time it is down the leg side
looks to clip this towards midwicket, something of a leading edge as the ball rolls towards square leg
goes for the sweep, a shot he uses often and well against spinners, not this time though, off the pads to the leg side
doosra, cleverly pitches it outside off, leaving the batsman guessing, Simmons goes for the cut, and he can't connect
swatted away towards deep midwicket this time
defended to the leg side, Ajmal starts with a fine over, West Indies struggling to get the run-rate up

a quicker one from Afridi, Simmons goes for the cut though there isn't too much width, did that hit the bat? Kamran Akmal doesn't think so, he's appealing for an lbw, the umpire is unmoved, neither has Simmons initially, the ball has dribbled away to the off side, the batsmen decide to try pinching a single, direct hit and Simmons is caught short, that lbw shout looked good as well, maybe just hit outside off
another vociferous lbw appeal, this was a quick slider, that looked close, perhaps didn't do enough to take leg stump, only thing that could have saved Samuels

all action here, Samuels charges out, doesn't get to the pitch but that doesn't prevent him from launching that over the bowler's head, has he got the distance, just enough, clears the rope by a couple of yards, evading Shehzad who put in a valiant effort to take that one
Afridi is doing it for Pakistan here, second key wicket in the over, both set batsmen dismissed, Samuels goes for the cut, bottom edges it on to the stumps
finally a relative action-free ball, defended towards cover
whoah, Ramdin needed to get his bat down quick to keep that out, one of Afridi's famed quicker ones, that was heading for off stump, Ramdin gets it away behind point though
drives this towards deep point
gets the outside edge and the ball rolls towards cover
defended off the front foot
down the leg side, sweeps it fine for a single
wide down the leg side
driven towards short cover, where Afridi fields, even as Kamran Akmal screams, "Lala, lala"
outside off from Afridi, Ramdin goes for the cut again, can't beat short third
sweeps this one, gets a single
defended off the front foot towards the bowler
length ball down the leg side, eased towards deep backward square leg for two
if there was a direct hit and that could have been the end of Dwayne Bravo, who late cut that one towards short third before deciding to chance the single
a dot ball to round off a top spell from Afridi, 4-0-23-1
is that another one? nope, after Bravo came down the trackmthat hit the top of his pad and popped up, Kamran Akmal made good ground to pouch that
towards cover for a single
another single, Babar drops it short, chopped towards cover
flicked towards deep backward square leg for one more, no shortage of singles now

Ramdin decides enough of the singles and goes for the big hit, he went for the sweep, connects well but not well enough to clear deep midwicket, not sure Ramdin was the man who should have been trying to clear the ropes, a role pretty much everyone else in the side looks better suited for
defends his first ball to the off side
pitched up, this is driven towards long-off for a single
length ball spinning in towards off, defended to the leg side
turns in a long way, chopped in front of point
tapped towards square leg for a single
spinning away, Sammy didn't pick it, beaten outside off

that looked out, was there some bat involved, huge lbw appeal but it is turned down, a length delivery on middle, Sammy was looking to work the ball away towards the leg side, doesn't connect, replays showthat might have been sliding down
a boundary after a long time, Bravo makes a bit of room and launches it over cover for four
firmly struck,but straight to backward point
full ball that is squeezed out by Bravo
wide down the leg side
short ball that Bravo should have put away, but he can't, off the pads for a leg-bye
Sammy gets the second boundary of the over, whacks this one between long-on and deep midwicket with immense power
keeps strike by sending the last ball of the over to long-on
Ajmal from round the wicket, drops it short, slapped towards deep point
full ball down the leg side, off the pads towards short fine
not where Sammy intended, but he doesn't care, the top edge runs away past the keeper to the third-man boundary, Sammy was shaping to launch that towards long-on, West Indies' 100 comes up
drops it short, it slides on, Sammy looks to carve it through the off, no contact, Kamran appeals for a caught behind
worked to deep midwicket for a couple

a rare expensive over from Ajmal, as the final ball is stabbed behind point for four, it was flat and fired in wide of off, Sammy connected well enough, Tanivr could have cut that off near the rope, has to sprint some way, he gets there and then tries to stop the ball with his boot, he can't
whoah! that is some shot from Bravo, Gul is welcomed with a massive hit for six, a short of length ball is absolutely murdered over long-on for six, "a big Dorothy," Shane Warne calls it
and another one, shortish ball outside off, Bravo gets hold of this one as well, hammers this over midwicket for six more
a free run as Gul tries to counter Bravo by bowling well outside off, but that is too far outside off
there's the famous Gul yorker, unlucky to not get a wicket there, Bravo can only get a thick inside edge, and the ball speeds away past the stumps to the keeper
stylish, we know he can dance,Bravo's on song here,it was full and wide, Bravo rocks back and crashes that over backward point, incredibly that almost carried all the way, superb hit from Bravo
the yorker is back, dug out towards the leg side for a quick single
length ball outside off, off the bottom of the bat but the ball sails over extra cover, batsmen sprint two
a touch short, the high Sammy back lift makes another appearance, drilled towards long-off
Dwayne Bravo, take a bow, that was another huge hit, sits up as it a bit short once more, 100kph, Bravo swings and connects, and that has gone a long way over the midwicket boundary

and another one! Pakistan are not in control of this game any more, West Indies have turned this around in the space of 10 minutes, Ajmal drops short, thank you says Bravo as he clobbers it beyond midwicket for six more
a full ball is squeezed out to midwicket for a single

Sammy joins the party, a monster hit straight over the bowler's head, Ajmal being taken apart in this over, Sammy really enjoyed that, pumping his fist after that shot, ridiculous power behind that stroke
this time Sammy shows he can place it as well, not just about the muscles, sends this through extra cover for four, West Indies are flying now

Bravo goes for a big swipe, loses his balance and can only bottom edge the ball onto his leg, the ball drops near the stumps, Bravo is on the floor, Sammy wants the single, Bravo decides to take on Kamran Akmal though he has lost his bat, Akmal hits direct, the end of the Bravo show, Tanvir was actually asking Kamran to not throw there
a touch show and that is a powerful mow towards deep square leg for four more
this time Sammy doesn't connect, short of length ball  sails over the stumps
Sammy power to the fore again, six more, a flat murderous hit over long-on, he's now 38 off 18

goes for another big one, but something of an edge here, the ball rolls towards midwicket, Russell pushes Sammy for the second, to make sure Sammy gets strike, Tanvir has to race across to field that, time enough for Sammy to get back

bowled from wide of the crease, thumped towards deep midwicket for two more, 82 off the final five, 59 off the final three, and once again it is not the feared names at the top of the order that have delivered for West Indies, it is the allrounder lower down, West Indies end on 166, which should prove quite a challenge for Pakistan's batsmen
